fgo:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
fgo:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

FetchFailnaught.DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Damage +10% for each fgomaster:Evil_Curse from the enemy. NL Apply !M! fgomaster:Evil_Curse. NL Double the enemy's fgomaster:Evil_Curse.

KurKigalIrkalla.NAME: Kur Kigal Irkalla
KurKigalIrkalla.DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 3 Strength. NL Gain 3 Artifact.

Sevendrive.NAME: Sevendrive
Sevendrive.DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 8 times. NL Gain !M!% fgomaster:NP.

MahaPralaya.NAME: Maha Pralaya
MahaPralaya.DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 5 times. NL Deal additional damage equal to total debuff for all enemies.

Excalibur.NAME: Excalibur
Excalibur.DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M!% fgomaster:NP.

YewBow.NAME: Yew Bow
YewBow.DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Poison, deal !D! damage again.

Shishifunjin.NAME: Shishifunjin
Shishifunjin.DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL All fgomaster:Stunned enemies lose their maximum HP !M!%.

SecondLife.NAME: Anpu Neb Ta Djeser
SecondLife.DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand and Upgrade it.

LaPucelle.NAME: La Pucelle
LaPucelle.DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply fgomaster:Combust equal to half damage. NL Shuffle 1 *Burn+ into your draw pile.

CharismaOfTheJade.NAME: Charisma of the Jade
CharismaOfTheJade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Deal triple Damage whenever you have 20+ fgomaster:Stars.

SongOfThePoet.NAME: Song of the Poet
SongOfThePoet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Gain fgomaster:NP equal to unblocked damage dealt.

GoldenGrail.NAME: Golden Grail
GoldenGrail.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! fgomaster:Combust X times to All enemies. NL At the end of 7-X turns, gain fgomaster:Seven_Beast_Crowns. NL Exhaust.

CrossingArcadia.NAME: Crossing Arcadia
CrossingArcadia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next !M! Attack you play return fgomaster:Stars and gain [E].

CrystallizationofWinter.NAME: Crystallization of Winter
CrystallizationofWinter.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 fgomaster:Guts. NL The next time you Trigger fgomaster:Guts, gain !M! Regen.

Chasmatis.NAME: Chasmatis
Chasmatis.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain fgomaster:Evil_Curse, draw !M! card.
Chasmatis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain fgomaster:Evil_Curse, draw !M! card. NL Gain 1 fgomaster:Evil_Curse.

CurtainoftheNight.NAME: Curtain of the Night
CurtainoftheNight.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand and Upgrade it.
CurtainoftheNight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand and Upgrade them.

ProofAndRebuttal.NAME: Proof and Rebuttal
ProofAndRebuttal.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Put any number of cards from your hand on top of draw pile. NL Exhaust.
ProofAndRebuttal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Put any number of cards from your hand on top of draw pile.

CharismaofAdversity.NAME: Charisma of Adversity
CharismaofAdversity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your HP is at or below 65, 50, 35 or 15, deal !D! damage each.

SarasvatiMeltout.NAME: Sarasvati Meltout
SarasvatiMeltout.DESCRIPTION: fgomaster:Noble_Phantasm. NL Remove all buff from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.
